#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
typedef long long long64;
long long int n;
int main()
{
 long long int a,b,c,m;
 unsigned int fibonacci(long long int x,long long int y);
 cin>>m>>n;
 while (m!=0 || n!=0)
 {
 a=1;
 b=1;
 c=0;
 while(a<=n)
 {
 c=a+b;
 if( a>=m  )
  {cout<<fibonacci(a,b) + 1<<"\n";   
   break;}
 a=b;
 b=c;
 }
 cin>>m>>n;   
 }   
 
 return 0;
 
}
 
 unsigned int fibonacci(long long int x , long long int y)
 {
   int i=0;
   long long int z=0;           
    while(z<=n)
    {
     z = x+y;            
     i++;   
     x=y;
     y=z;        
    }           
   return i;            
 }
